subtitles.text: 一氧化碳还原氧化铁
subtitles.text_en: Reduction of Iron Oxide with Carbon Monoxide

subtitles.text: 这是一套用一氧化碳还原
subtitles.text_en: This is an experimental setup using carbon monoxide to reduce

subtitles.text: 氧化铁的实验装置
subtitles.text_en: iron oxide in this apparatus

subtitles.text: 硬质玻璃管中部装有少量红色氧化铁粉末
subtitles.text_en: The middle section of the hard glass tube contains a small amount of red iron oxide powder

subtitles.text: 锥形瓶中装有澄清的石灰水
subtitles.text_en: The conical flask contains clear limewater

subtitles.text: 装置末端用酒精灯点燃多余的一氧化碳
subtitles.text_en: Excess carbon monoxide is ignited with an alcohol lamp at the end of the apparatus
subtitles.safety_zh: 应使用气球收集或尾气处理装置替代直接点燃，因一氧化碳有毒且易燃易爆
subtitles.safety_en: A balloon collection or exhaust treatment system should replace direct ignition, as CO is toxic, flammable, and explosive

subtitles.text: 经检查气密性良好后
subtitles.text_en: After confirming the system is airtight

subtitles.text: 先通入一氧化碳排尽装置中的空气
subtitles.text_en: First, introduce CO to purge air from the system
subtitles.safety_zh: 必须预先排空氧气防止CO与空气混合高温爆炸
subtitles.safety_en: Pre-purge oxygen to prevent explosive CO-air mixtures at high temperatures

subtitles.text: 这时锥形瓶中的石灰水不变浑浊
subtitles.text_en: The limewater remains clear at this stage

subtitles.text: 然后点燃酒精喷灯
subtitles.text_en: Then ignite the alcohol burner

subtitles.text: 加热玻璃管中的红色氧化铁粉末
subtitles.text_en: Heat the red iron oxide powder in the glass tube

subtitles.text: 片刻后
subtitles.text_en: After some time

subtitles.text: 观察到玻璃管中的红色氧化铁
subtitles.text_en: The red iron oxide in the tube is observed

subtitles.text: 被一氧化碳还原成黑色的铁
subtitles.text_en: being reduced by CO to black metallic iron

subtitles.text: 同时生成的二氧化碳
subtitles.text_en: Simultaneously produced carbon dioxide

subtitles.text: 使澄清的石灰水变浑浊
subtitles.text_en: turns the limewater turbid

subtitles.text: 待一氧化碳还原氧化铁的反应结束后
subtitles.text_en: After the reduction reaction completes

subtitles.text: 先撤去酒精喷灯
subtitles.text_en: First remove the alcohol burner
subtitles.safety_zh: 防止高温铁粉接触氧气发生二次氧化甚至爆炸
subtitles.safety_en: Prevent secondary oxidation/explosion from hot iron contacting oxygen

subtitles.text: 继续通入一氧化碳
subtitles.text_en: Continue CO flow
subtitles.safety_zh: 维持保护性气氛直至体系冷却，避免空气倒吸引发危险
subtitles.safety_en: Maintain protective atmosphere until cooling to prevent air backflow

subtitles.text: 在硬质玻璃管中的反应
subtitles.text_en: The reaction in the hard glass tube

subtitles.text: 混合物冷却后停止实验
subtitles.text_en: concludes after mixture cooling

subtitles.text: 观察到原来红色的氧化铁粉末
subtitles.text_en: The originally red iron oxide powder

subtitles.text: 已经被完全还原成黑色的铁了
subtitles.text_en: is completely reduced to black iron
